name: A-Train 9 V4.0 : Japan Rail Simulator
description: A-Train is back, and better than ever. The biggest and best city builder, transport simulation game returns with a host of new features.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7/8.1/10 Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9 series or better, RADEON HD4000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7/8.1/10 Processor: Core i7-860(2.80GHz) Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 (GeForce GTX 760 for 4K display) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound Compatible

reviews.review_text: the city is a big sallier
